name: Dig it out! #LD48
description:
You have found yourself in a possession of an amazing plot of land! That land is full of gold and treasures! How much riches can you get with the help of your trusty shovel?

Instructions:

  • Move with arrow keys or WASD
  • Use shovel with mouse cursor
  • To use the shop you have to go near it

Shop items description:

  • Rope - one time use - takes you to level 0 from any level
  • Fixing shovel - restores shovel durability
  • Upgrading shovel durability - doubles shovel durability + restores it to 100%
  • Upgrading shovel range - every level of range your shovels dig radius increases ( 1 - 1 square, 2 - 9 squares, 3 - 25 squares , 4 - 49 squares)

Tools used:

  • Godot Engine 3.3
  • Pixelorama
  • Krita
  • sfxr
  • beepbox.co
  • font: https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/tt2020-style-e
